sentences.en: And, tender churl, makes t waste in niggarding.
sentences.cn: 温柔的怪物呵, 用吝啬浪费了全部.

sentences.en: Churl I'll drop the love - juice in your eyes. Hey !
sentences.cn: 坏东西,我将在你的眼精滴进爱情的花液.

sentences.en: Churlish: like, or befitting a churl ; boorish or vulgar.
sentences.cn: 象或适合粗鲁人的; 粗鲁的或庸俗的.

sentences.en: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentences.cn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷，才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人吧。

sentences.en: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentences.cn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷， 才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人。

sentences.en: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl. Do you know anything of his history?
sentences.cn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷，才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人吧。你知道一点他的经历吗？

sentences.en: He must have had some upsdowns in life to make him such a churl .
sentences.cn: 他一定经历了很多起起落落才形成了变成了如此粗鄙的人。

sentences.en: The vile person shall be no more called liberal , nor churl said to be bountiful.
sentences.cn: 愚顽人不再被称为高尚,恶棍也不再被称为大方.

sentences.en: The vile person shall be no more called liberal , nor the churl said to be bountiful.
sentences.cn: 愚顽人不再称为高明 、 吝啬人不再称为大方.

words.tran_cn: 没有礼貌的；脾气暴躁的
吝啬鬼；乡下人；粗暴的人；（中世纪的）农民

trans.tran_cn: 下贱的人，吝啬鬼，村夫，农夫
